DOC.brief_title: PROS-2 Dose Response Effects Exogenous Testosterone Prostate
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator overall goal ( ) determine relationship serum prostate tissue hormone concentration men response increase dos exogenous androgen ; ( ii ) determine impact alteration serum tissue testosterone concentration prostate epithelial cell function phenotype ; ( iii ) determine relationship prostatic androgen alteration tissue microenvironment . The investigator perform study healthy , middle-aged men address follow Specific Aims : Specific Aims : To compare dose-response relationship serum testosterone intraprostatic androgen androgen action , serum testosterone anabolic activity healthy , middle-aged men . Hypothesis : The investigator hypothesize low level serum testosterone low concentration intraprostatic testosterone dihydrotestosterone ( DHT ) . However , serum testosterone concentration within even normal range significant increase intraprostatic testosterone dihydrotestosterone . In contrast , investigator expect anabolic activity increase increase concentration circulate testosterone . Secondarily , investigator hypothesize increase level serum testosterone beyond low normal range little impact androgen action within prostate . Approach : The investigator conduct randomize , placebo-controlled trial healthy men medically castrate administered one five different dos testosterone gel ( Androgel ) 12 week .
DOC.criteria: In good health , without severe systemic illness ( i.e. , renal , liver , cardiac lung disease , cancer , insulin dependent diabetes ) Male age 25 55 year old Able understand comply protocol instruction requirement International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) < 11 Agrees donate blood study Normal serum total T , LH , FSH , urine analysis , COMP , CBC sperm count History , current breast cancer prostate cancer Clinically significant finding digital rectal exam nodule , area induration malignancy abnormal prostate ultrasound History invasive therapy BPH Current past treatment 5Î±reductase inhibitor History drug alcohol abuse within past 12 month History bleed disorder anticoagulation Skin disease might interfere Tgel absorption Participation another drug study past 3 month A firstdegree relative ( i.e . father , brother ) history prostate cancer History infertility desire fertility within 6 month , current pregnant female partner Weight > 320 pound BMI > 40 PSA Level > 2.1
